name: Forsaken Generation
description: Old school, hardcore, turn based RPG made with RPGMAKER MV. 30+ hrs of gameplay. 20+ Dungeons to EXPLORE. 7 characters to choose from at any time, each bring their own tactics to combat. SCI-FI / FANTASY Storyline.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Vista, or 7 Processor: 1 Ghz processor or faster Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 2600 MB available space
